column5: Well last week I posted a question about bright coloured senkos .This is what a bright PINK senko got me on Sunday  ]
Nice bass man, the bubblegum(yellow/orange) dinger can work wonders. Solid pink thought, might need to try that version out next season.  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
Even I catch nice bass with the pink worms.  JF
how did you rig it? wacky or texas? thanks
Great fish man.  Glad you got into a decent fish.  Lets try to hunt them this fall.
wacky I almost always fish them that way.Ya you have my number Evan boat and I are always ready to go

Nice fish, I Thought we were gonna keep the pink senkos a secret....LOL, I think the pink senkos are like a drug, the bass just cant get enough....My takle box has two kinds of lures, pink senkos and topwater and thats all I need.....Real men fish with pink, isnt that right fishing nut?
